# Force Lash (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[1st Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** One standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a 3-inch strip of leather)

**Range:** Personal

**Effect:** 10-foot-long whip

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 60

You create a whip made of energy that comes out of the palm of your hand. You can wield the whip as though you were proficient with it. The weapon has a 10-foot reach and inflicts 1d6 points of force damage + 1 point for every two levels (maximum +10). You can also make grapple attacks with the weapon without provoking attacks of opportunity.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *energy lash* to *force lash* for campaign continuity. 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2, Blackguard 1 to Level.
